attributes.review:
I am to apart of the hole little kid writing crazy reviews but right when I got on there it crashed and the fonts were very small for me to read and then they were really big also it has a LOT of glitches also his ideas are crazy plus

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: tiktok isn’t a security threat when it has an american CEO & the servers are located depending on the market ✨🧚🏼‍♀️ even if it was a security threat we been knew and we still downloaded the app anyways because users don’t care. trump is just upset that tiktok gives gen z and others a platform to discuss politics that don’t support him and gives us a way to form ways to screw up his rallies

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: My kids told me I should download this application to support our lord and savior Donald trump ,, but what I DID NOT know is that it would INSTALL VIRUSES on my PHONE ... I am DISGUSTED !!! My phone stated to shut off randomly and now my face book is logging me out on its own !! So ,, so disappointed in whoever made this application ... I want to speak to the creator of this application ... It deleted all the photos I had of my grand kids !!!!!!’

attributes.title: too slow
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wasn’t getting adequate information about the cheeto’s campaign from his text updates. However, upon opening the app, which took a very long time to download, I was hit by slow speeds. It is very difficult to navigate, and I am disappointed that daddy’s money couldn’t go into better programming.

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes of being updated daily on the president, but instead I was mobbed with notifications. Super annoying. I tried to turn them off but it took me half an hour to find the setting that allowed me to turn them off in the app. Also it’s biased. All I wanted was information, not opinions. I always liked twitter more anyway

attributes.title: Muffins in the freezer
attributes.review: I am completely disappointed with how this app turned out. Not only did it take a month to download.  As soon as I tried to run it I was greeted by an orange glitch. I emailed the company many times to get this fixed but that’s all I see in my screen. I was overly excited to see what this app has to offer but overall it was just Trash🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I was scrolling on tiktok and I found your app and people saying that we should do a bad rating so that’s what I’m doing, as soon as I downloaded it my dog grabbed a orange and threw it away and after that my walls turned orange and I started hallucinating and I don’t want to be 🍊educated 🍊 so I finally deleted the app and decided to tell you my story of the horrible app that’s you’ve created.

attributes.title: no no no
attributes.review: I was very excited to download this app and ✨fill up my storage✨  but then after waiting 4 weeks for it to download i opened the app and saw a face that made me cry. my dog is a good dog so she cried with me. after that i was about to sign up when my cat started glitching. she flew up in the air like always, but this time she stayed there. she is now dead, but still stuck in the air.  DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️Orange🍊.                                                       Tik tok
attributes.review: I open the app for the first time and see a horrible picture of a ✨Orange ✨ I quickly logged off I went to sleep and dreamed of this horrible nightmare🎭I am appalled by this I need physiological therapy to over come this fear of mine🙍🏼‍♀️ so I was walking to my therapy and someone metioned a ✨Orange✨ I quickly fell to my Kness I canot walk anymore it is horrible App Store please cancel this app it needa go

attributes.title: DOES NOT WORK
attributes.review: This app does not work at all, I opened up the app and it’s just at a blank page! I don’t know why there’s an app on apple that obviously doesn’t work. I don’t recommend you download this app, it’s trash and not useful at all! My phone also froze with this app! If you don’t want any problems with your phone don’t download the app, apple should just take it down!!!
